snippet: Andy Murray plans to remain outspoken against doping, despite facing a backlash for some of his recent comments on performance-enhancing drugs in tennis....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray plans to remain outspoken against doping, despite facing a backlash for some of his recent comments on performance-enhancing drugs in tennis.

headline.print_headline: Murray to Remain Outspoken Against Doping
headline.main: Murray to Remain Outspoken Against Doping
